cause.description:
i am trying to collect donations to buy some stuff your own teddy kits to bring to the children at the hospital at christmas time....some children wont be able to be home for christmas and i would like to try and bring a smile to there faces....please help me in this cause....all your support is greatly appreciated...my goal is to buy 35 kits and all other donations above and beyond the cost of the 35 kits, will be used to buy items off the sick kids foundation hospital wish list...please help me in reaching this goal
1. these children need our support
2. without our donations the hospital wont survive
3. give generously and support the cause
cause.mission: provide donations and teddys to the sick kids foundation
cause.name: Teddys for sick kids
